name: Caldwell - The Last Tsar - Belicoso
additionalNotes: Caldwell The Last Tsar have garnered a huge following thanks to its unique combination of rare, aged tobaccos and a one-of –a kind taste that simply screams Robert Caldwell! Limited to just 500 boxes of 10, The Last Tsar cigars come dressed in a silky golden-brown hybrid Connecticut wrapper atop a manufacturers secret blend of binder and long filler tobacco. Part of the blend may be a secret, but it’s no secret that you will enjoy a full-bodied smoke chock-full of delicious flavors that includes cedar, coffee, nuts, raisins, and spice. If you are on the hunt for full-bodied cigar.
